thread.title: New ‘Mass Effect Andromeda’ Combat Trailer Shows Off Amazing Gameplay and Awesome Weapons
thread.title_full: New ‘Mass Effect Andromeda’ Combat Trailer Shows Off Amazing Gameplay and Awesome Weapons

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: New ‘Mass Effect Andromeda’ Combat Trailer Shows Off Amazing Gameplay and Awesome Weapons
text:
Mass Effect Andromeda will be making its way to gamers in a little over a month, but before then, BioWare has unleashed a new combat trailer to further heighten anticipation surrounding the drop. Eluded to via the term “combat trailer,” the clip thus focuses on fast-paced gameplay and insane weaponry.
Gamers can look forward to playing as Scott or Sarah Ryder, twin characters whose father was an N7 just like Commander Shepard in previous games. Whomever you choose, you will then lead the fight for a new home in hostile territory, far far away.
As you play, you will ultimately begin to unravel the mysteries of the Andromeda galaxy.
Mass Effect Andromeda debuts March 21 for PC, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.
